title: Implement backend evaluator to detect alert triggers (fit drift, segment changes, emerging high-fit cohorts)

sections.text: Build the backend job/service that periodically evaluates customer/segment signals against the trigger conditions defined in [GOLD-40]. The evaluator should generate normalized alert events (type, entity, timestamp, computed metrics, threshold values) and persist them for downstream delivery/UI. Include idempotency/deduping so the same condition within a window doesn’t create repeated alerts, and handle missing/low-volume data per the spec.
